DOC.detailed_description: Biologic-naïve rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) patient fulfilled 2010 criterion American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) RA enrol . All patient randomize 6-month treatment either oral DXM [ dextromethorphan hydrobromide ; Detosiv Slow Release® ( 60mg per tablet , Lotus Pharmaceutical Company , Taipei , Taiwan ) T1/2 = 7.75h , Tmax = 4.83h , Cmax = 14.6 ng mL-1 mean residual time = 5.86 h , 120mg per day daily dose take breakfast ] placebo pill appearance DXM tablet . The randomization perform pharmacy Taichung Veterans General Hospital . Non-study medication change course study . Twenty-four patient receive add-one DXM therapy 24 patient receive traditional DMARDs alone stable dose . Disease activity assess 28-joint disease activity score ( DAS28 ) start add-on DXM therapy ( baseline ) end 6 month therapy without add-on DXM . Patients categorize good , moderate poor responder base amount change DAS28 level DAS28 reach .
